name: Your last 10 seconds
description:
Hold space to keep your eyes open, but be careful as it will exhaust you and you only have 10 seconds left to live. Make each one of them count.

You can blink by clicking when your eyes are open. This may or may not be useful, you never know.

I you can spare the time to install the PC executable below, you would make our sound designer very happy^^ (as some audio effects do not work at all in the browser version)
